text:
I assume if you're in this channel you already know... But *<https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-HubSpot-global-presents-HubSpotextend/|HubSpot.Extend()>* is right around the corner!

Have you gotten your ticket? If you’re building, customizing, integrating, and developing on HubSpot the HubSpot.Extend() conference is for you—streaming right into whatever space you call your office on *October 27!*

Attendees will learn new techniques and tips in bite-sized workshops, dig into technical topics during breakout sessions from product and community experts, and enjoy plenty of opportunities to connect with like-minded developers around the world. Plus, we’ll have exciting announcements during the keynote you won’t want to miss. i

:sprocket-dance: <https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-HubSpot-global-presents-HubSpotextend/|Register Now>:sprocket-dance:
